title: lag
body: constant 120fps, constant 60ping, constant lag every 3sec. even rebooting computer didint help, so its not my fault. help/fix plz

replies.body: Hey man i have the same issue i restarted computer and it didnt work - rito please fix this lag (Posted: Patch 6.6 heavy lag in teamfights)

Hey Wraith122, 

You should try Riot's connection KB and see if that helps with your high ping :) 

Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

I'll be on for a bit so if you need help feel free to reach out to me :) 


{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
It didin't help. I am not having high ping, my pings are as usual, but i lag. It isn't only me, some of my friends lag too, it started after patch 5.19 or 5.20.
